sense.def:
To prop an object on something
pomeni postaviti neki predmet ob nekaj, tako da ga tisto podpira.

seg.quote: She propped her chin on her hand.
His gun lay propped against the wall.

sense.def:
A prop
je palica ali drug predmet, s katerim nekaj podpremo.

seg.quote: We need a clothes prop for the washing line.

sense.def:
The props in a play or film
so predmeti in pohištvo, ki jih uporabljamo pri gledališki igri ali filmu.

seg.quote: The sets, props, and costumes were all ready.

sense.def:
To prop something up
pomeni nekaj podpreti, tako da stoji pokončno ali je dvignjeno.

seg.quote: His feet were propped up on the coffee table.
...timbers used to prop a building up during alterations.

sense.def:
Kadar ena organizacija ali skupina
props up another
, pomaga drugi preživeti.

seg.quote: The Government does not intend to prop up declining industries.
